 From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia

 Wikimedia Commons has media related to  Paraphilias . 
 Paraphilias  refers to powerful and persistent sexual interest other than in copulatory or precopulatory behavior with  phenotypically  normal, consenting adult human partners.
